lines: To be whole. To be complete. Wildness reminds us what it means to be human, what we are connected to rather than what we are separate from.
The world is incomprehensibly beautiful—an endless prospect of magic and wonder.
Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference.
Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
Where there is love there is life.
The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
The highest vocation we can have is love.
Use your voice for kindness, your ears for compassion, your hands for charity, your mind for truth, and your heart for love.
There never was any heart truly great and generous, that was not also tender and compassionate.
If you are going to be compassionate, be prepared for action!
What do we live for; if it is not to make life less difficult for each other?
Compassion is the greatest form of love humans have to offer.
When you take care of yourself, you’re a better person for others. When you feel good about yourself, you treat others better.
If your compassion does not include yourself, it is incomplete.
Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
Self-care is not self-indulgence, it is self-preservation.
Rest and self-care are so important. When you take time to replenish your spirit, it allows you to serve from the overflow. You cannot serve from an empty vessel.
You are a match for your mountain.
The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor a person perfected without trials.
Use what you’ve been through as fuel, believe in yourself and be unstoppable!
Although the world is full of suffering, it's full also of the overcoming it.
I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars
Light tomorrow with today.
It's never too late to be what you might have been.
For it's not light that is needed, but fire; it's not the gentle shower, but thunder. We need the storm, the whirlwind and the earthquake in our hearts.
We must not allow the clock and the calendar to blind us to the fact that each moment of life is a miracle and mystery.
The secret of change is to focus all of your energy, not on fighting the old, but on building the new.

When you know who you are; when your mission is clear and you burn with the inner fire of unbreakable will; no cold can touch your heart; no deluge can dampen your purpose. You know that you are alive.
The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
There is no greater gift you can give or receive than to honor your calling. It's why you were born. And how you become most truly alive.
The purpose that you wish to find in life, like a cure you seek, is not going to fall from the sky. ...I believe purpose is something for which one is responsible; it's not just divinely assigned.
Many have a wrong idea of what constitutes true happiness. It is not attained through self-gratification but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
It always seems impossible until its done.
